overview: The first trot survival ever that shook Korea, Mr. Trot. The birth of Top 6 that received 35.7% of the highest ratings and national love. The hot stage of the Seoul performance of "Mr. Trot Korea Thank You Concert" and beyond, the attractive daily life of Top 6 comes like a gift. Once again their glorious dreams, our shining companion, who will bring comfort once again!
title: Mr. Trot: The Movie
